areas.name: Business
areas.description: Within the business module of your studies, you will learn how to structure and execute projects

areas.name: Communication
areas.description: We teach you practical skills of how the social dynamics work in a digital world, and how to successfully conduct market analysis in digital space

areas.name: Design
areas.description: Understand the principles behind design execution, why it is important, and how to apply it

areas.name: Frontend
areas.description: What goes “behind the scenes” of functioning online platforms (websites) and bestow you with the knowledge to execute your ideas in real time.

areas.name: Electives
areas.description: Specialized teaching in each of the four areas of study. The electives will be cancelled iupon insufficient demand

areas.name: Iternship
areas.description: Practice your acquired skills in a professional environment tackling current market demands.

areas.name: Final Project
areas.description: Create, produce and execute your idea as a group and pitch it in front of an external examinator who will asses the creativity and execution of your final project.
